Dentist's Office.english: 1. I have a dental appointment tomorrow.
Dentist's Office.italian: Ho un appuntamento dentistico domani.
Dentist's Office.spanish: Tengo una cita dental mañana.
Dentist's Office.german: Ich habe morgen einen Zahnarzttermin.

Dentist's Office.english: 2. The dentist will examine my teeth.
Dentist's Office.italian: Il dentista mi controllerà i denti.
Dentist's Office.spanish: El dentista examinará mis dientes.
Dentist's Office.german: Der Zahnarzt wird meine Zähne untersuchen.

Dentist's Office.english: 3. I need a filling for my cavity.
Dentist's Office.italian: Ho bisogno di una otturazione per la mia carie.
Dentist's Office.spanish: Necesito un empaste para mi caries.
Dentist's Office.german: Ich brauche eine Füllung für mein Loch.

Dentist's Office.english: 4. The dental hygienist will clean my teeth.
Dentist's Office.italian: L'igienista dentale mi pulirà i denti.
Dentist's Office.spanish: El higienista dental me limpiará los dientes.
Dentist's Office.german: Die Dentalhygienikerin wird meine Zähne reinigen.

Dentist's Office.english: 5. I am scared of going to the dentist.
Dentist's Office.italian: Ho paura di andare dal dentista.
Dentist's Office.spanish: Tengo miedo de ir al dentista.
Dentist's Office.german: Ich habe Angst, zum Zahnarzt zu gehen.

Dentist's Office.english: 6. My dentist recommended braces for my crooked teeth.
Dentist's Office.italian: Il mio dentista ha consigliato l'apparecchio per i miei denti storti.
Dentist's Office.spanish: Mi dentista me recomendó los frenos para mis dientes torcidos.
Dentist's Office.german: Mein Zahnarzt hat mir Zahnspangen für meine schiefen Zähne empfohlen.

Dentist's Office.english: 7. The dentist gave me a prescription for painkillers.
Dentist's Office.italian: Il dentista mi ha prescritto un antidolorifico.
Dentist's Office.spanish: El dentista me dio una receta para analgésicos.
Dentist's Office.german: Der Zahnarzt hat mir ein Rezept für Schmerzmittel gegeben.

Dentist's Office.english: 8. I have a toothache and need to see a dentist.
Dentist's Office.italian: Ho un mal di denti e devo vedere un dentista.
Dentist's Office.spanish: Tengo dolor de muelas y necesito ver a un dentista.
Dentist's Office.german: Ich habe Zahnschmerzen und muss einen Zahnarzt aufsuchen.

Dentist's Office.english: 9. I have to floss my teeth every day.
Dentist's Office.italian: Devo usare il filo interdentale tutti i giorni.
Dentist's Office.spanish: Debo usar hilo dental todos los días.
Dentist's Office.german: Ich muss meine Zähne jeden Tag mit Zahnseide reinigen.

Dentist's Office.english: 10. The dentist will take an X-ray of my mouth.
Dentist's Office.italian: Il dentista mi farà una radiografia della bocca.
Dentist's Office.spanish: El dentista me tomará una radiografía de la boca.
Dentist's Office.german: Der Zahnarzt wird ein Röntgenbild von meinem Mund machen.

Dentist's Office.english: 11. I need a dental crown for my cracked tooth.
Dentist's Office.italian: Ho bisogno di una corona dentale per il mio dente incrinato.
Dentist's Office.spanish: Necesito una corona dental para mi diente agrietado.
Dentist's Office.german: Ich brauche eine Zahnkrone für meinen rissigen Zahn.

Dentist's Office.english: 12. I have sensitive teeth and gums.
Dentist's Office.italian: Ho denti e gengive sensibili.
Dentist's Office.spanish: Tengo dientes y encías sensibles.
Dentist's Office.german: Ich habe empfindliche Zähne und Zahnfleisch.

Dentist's Office.english: 13. The dentist will numb my mouth before the procedure.
Dentist's Office.italian: Il dentista mi anestetizzerà la bocca prima dell'intervento.
Dentist's Office.spanish: El dentista me adormecerá la boca antes del procedimiento.
Dentist's Office.german: Der Zahnarzt wird meinen Mund vor dem Eingriff betäuben.

Dentist's Office.english: 14. I need a teeth whitening treatment.
Dentist's Office.italian: Ho bisogno di un trattamento sbiancante per i denti.
Dentist's Office.spanish: Necesito un tratamiento de blanqueamiento dental.
Dentist's Office.german: Ich brauche eine Zahnaufhellungsbehandlung.

Dentist's Office.english: 15. The dental assistant will assist the dentist during the procedure.
Dentist's Office.italian: L'assistente dentale assisterà il dentista durante l'intervento.
Dentist's Office.spanish: El asistente dental asistirá al dentista durante el procedimiento.
Dentist's Office.german: Die zahnärztliche Assistentin wird den Zahnarzt während des Eingriffs unterstützen.

Dentist's Office.english: 16. I have a small cavity that needs to be filled.
Dentist's Office.italian: Ho una piccola carie che deve essere otturata.
Dentist's Office.spanish: Tengo una pequeña caries que necesita ser empastada.
Dentist's Office.german: Ich habe eine kleine Karies, die gefüllt werden muss.

Dentist's Office.english: 17. The dentist will give me a dental cleaning.
Dentist's Office.italian: Il dentista mi farà una pulizia dentale.
Dentist's Office.spanish: El dentista me hará una limpieza dental.
Dentist's Office.german: Der Zahnarzt wird eine Zahnreinigung bei mir machen.

Dentist's Office.english: 18. I need to schedule a dental check-up.
Dentist's Office.italian: Devo fissare un controllo dentale.
Dentist's Office.spanish: Necesito agendar una revisión dental.
Dentist's Office.german: Ich muss einen Zahnarzttermin vereinbaren.

Dentist's Office.english: 19. The dentist advised me to brush my teeth twice a day.
Dentist's Office.italian: Il dentista mi ha consigliato di lavarmi i denti due volte al giorno.
Dentist's Office.spanish: El dentista me aconsejó cepillarme los dientes dos veces al día.
Dentist's Office.german: Der Zahnarzt hat mir geraten, meine Zähne zweimal am Tag zu putzen.

Dentist's Office.english: 20. I have a loose tooth and need to see the dentist.
Dentist's Office.italian: Ho un dente allentato e devo vedere il dentista.
Dentist's Office.spanish: Tengo un diente flojo y necesito ver al dentista.
Dentist's Office.german: Ich habe einen wackelnden Zahn und muss zum Zahnarzt gehen.
